title: The potential of pulsed electromagnetic field-generated shock waves for reducing microbial load and improving homogenization in raw milk
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Ehsan Seyfali, Mohammad Hadi Khoshtaghaza, Milad Rouhi, Zahra Sarlak, Gholamhassan Najafi
